p: Total starch, resistant starch content, amylose content, total dietary fiber, swelling, solubility, crystallinity degree, stability, Gelatinization, and retrogradation analysis of DFPLA starch were determined according to the defined procedures, the detail of the procedures can be found elsewhere ( Yuliana et al., 2012). Pasting profile of the starch was determined by using a rapid visco analyzer (Newport Scientific, Australia). Detailed pasting profiling procedure can be found elsewhere ( Yadav et al., 2016).
